Package br.com.caelum.vraptor.ioc.pico

Interface Summary
ComponentFactoryRegistry  
Loader Loads all resources, components and interceptors for vraptor.
Registrar  
Scanner Implementations of this interface define several strategies for classpath scanning.
 

Class Summary
ComponentFactoryRegistrar Prepares all components implementing br.com.caelum.vraptor.ioc.ComponentFactory to be used as Pico ComponentAdapters.
ComponentHandler  
ConverterRegistrar Prepares all classes annotated with @Convert to be used as converters.
DefaultComponentFactoryRegistry Registry to all ComponentRegistry classes
InterceptorRegistrar Prepares all classes annotated with @Intercepts to be used as VRaptor's interceptors.
PicoBasedContainer Deprecated.
PicoComponentAdapter Pico's ComponentAdapter wrapping VRaptor's ComponentFactory
PicoComponentRegistry Deprecated.
PicoProvider Deprecated.
ReflectionsScanner Scanner implementation using the nice Reflections project (http://code.google.com/p/reflections) to do classpath scanning.
ResourceRegistrar Prepares special components annotated with @Resource to be reachable through web requests; i.e.
StereotypedComponentRegistrar Prepares all classes with meta-annotation @Stereotype to be used as VRaptor components.
